mapper.select: SELECT FreeBoard.boardName,FreeBoard.id,FreeBoard.title,FreeBoard.regDate FROM lsedb.FreeBoard where FreeBoard.memberId = #{param1} union select SiteBoard.boardName, SiteBoard.id,SiteBoard.title,SiteBoard.regDate From lsedb.SiteBoard where SiteBoard.memberId =#{param1} union select RequestBoard.boardName, RequestBoard.id, RequestBoard.title, RequestBoard.regDate From lsedb.RequestBoard where RequestBoard.memberId=#{param1} order by regDate desc;
SELECT FreeBoard.boardName,FreeBoard.id,FreeBoard.title,FreeBoard.regDate FROM lsedb.FreeBoard where FreeBoard.memberId = #{param1} order by regDate desc;
SELECT SiteBoard.boardName,SiteBoard.id,SiteBoard.title,SiteBoard.regDate FROM lsedb.SiteBoard where SiteBoard.memberId = #{param1} order by regDate desc;
SELECT RequestBoard.boardName,RequestBoard.id,RequestBoard.title,RequestBoard.regDate FROM lsedb.RequestBoard where RequestBoard.memberId = #{param1} order by regDate desc;

SELECT sum(A+B+C) sum FROM( (SELECT COUNT(*) A FROM lsedb.FreeBoard where lsedb.FreeBoard.memberId=#{param1}) as A join (SELECT Count(*) B FROM lsedb.SiteBoard where memberId=#{param1}) As B join (SELECT COUNT(*) C FROM lsedb.RequestBoard where memberId=#{param1}) as C);

SELECT sum(A+B+C) sum FROM( (SELECT COUNT(*) A FROM lsedb.FreeComment where lsedb.FreeComment.memberId=#{param1}) as A join (SELECT Count(*) B FROM lsedb.SiteComment where memberId=#{param1}) As B join (SELECT COUNT(*) C FROM lsedb.RequestComment where memberId=#{param1}) as C);
SELECT count(*) FROM lsedb.SiteBoardLike where memberId=#{param1};

SELECT FreeComment.boardName,FreeComment.content,FreeComment.regDate, FreeComment.freeBoardId id FROM lsedb.FreeComment where FreeComment.memberId = #{param1} union select RequestComment.boardName,RequestComment.content,RequestComment.regDate, RequestComment.requestBoardId id From lsedb.RequestComment where RequestComment.memberId =#{param1} union select SiteComment.boardName,SiteComment.content,SiteComment.regDate, SiteComment.siteBoardId id From lsedb.SiteComment where SiteComment.memberId=#{param1} order by regDate desc;
select SiteBoardLike.*, SiteBoard.title, SiteBoard.regDate from SiteBoardLike inner join SiteBoard on SiteBoardLike.siteBoardId = SiteBoard.id where SiteBoardLike.memberId = #{param1}
